LanguageData.Dusk.CustomDamageTooltip: Enable a custom damage worker that prevents damage being applied to mechadendrite slots if there's no implant in them.
LanguageData.Dusk.OldSlotsTooltip: Enables the old style of mechadendrite slots mostly for legacy reasons. WARNING: HEDIFFS ARE PERFORMANCE-HEAVY AND ADDING ON MORE SLOTS WILL EXASPERATE IT!
LanguageData.Dusk.HardModeTooltip: Adds on drawbacks to mechadendrites, makes them harder to research, craft, find, and more. This is not recommended unless you want a more hardcore experience.
